CONSOLE ERROR: line 24: WebSocket connection to 'ws://127.0.0.1:8891/' failed: Error in connection establishment: net::ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED
Verify firing error event behaviors in Worker.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".
